main_definition: Slow refers to a reduced speed, pace or rate of movement or action.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Taking a long time to do something or move at a low speed.
meanings_and_examples.example: The traffic was moving very slowly due to heavy congestion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relatively late in development, maturation, or progress compared to others or expected norms.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her growth and learning were slow during her first year of school.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a low frequency, pitch, or intensity in sound.
meanings_and_examples.example: The old piano keys have started to go out of tune, producing very low sounds.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Showing little emotion or energy; lacking liveliness or vigor.
meanings_and_examples.example: His slow movements and subdued expression indicated his sadness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a careful, cautious manner to avoid mistakes or accidents.
meanings_and_examples.example: She took her time while learning how to drive to ensure she didn't make any errors.
